caller_intent: The caller needs to update their auto insurance draft account due to an invalid account and seeks assistance with separating insurance coverage for themselves and their children following a divorce.
resolution_steps: Agent acknowledged the need to update the auto draft account.
Agent offered to transfer the caller to a specialist to handle policy adjustments related to divorce and child coverage.
knowledge_required: Policy separation processes for divorced individuals
summary: Caller requested assistance updating an invalid auto insurance draft account and separating insurance coverage for themselves and their children following a divorce. The agent offered to connect them with a specialist to resolve the matter.
